name: Bee-o-hazard
description:
The Cordy-strophe is here!

As the hordes of parasitized insects hunt after your lymph, your trusty grub cannons and mantis scythes are the only thing bee-tween you and their buzzing assault!

In this first person shooter, your weapons will shoot automatically at certain intervals - weave and bob between your enemies, and let your arms wreak havoc amongst them!

WASD controls movement
Mouse controls camera

__

This game is a submission to the 7dfps 2022 jam (https://itch.io/jam/7dfps-2022), inspired by both Vampire Survivors and Devil Daggers
__

Credits

Programming: Fabrício Caixeta (fabsca - itch.io) & Romualdo Santos (ROMUBOY - itch.io)

Art: Atlas/Allan Dattwyler (Atlas - itch.io)

Game Design: Lobba Mattos (LobbaMattos - itch.io), Fabrício Caixeta (fabsca - itch.io) & Romualdo Santos (ROMUBOY - itch.io)

HUD and banner font: "Slimespooky", by Jadatype, at https://www.dafont.com/pt/slimespooky.font

Music: "Carmack" by professorlamp, at Carmack | OpenGameArt.org

SFX: "Pain Sounds" by EmoPreben, at Pain sounds by EmoPreben | OpenGameArt.org
